Wednesday, May 30, 2007























Infrared burners heat up backyard grills
For a quarter century, chefs at pricey steakhouses have been searing meat on burners that cook with infrared energy. Now the high-temperature technology may be coming to a backyard barbecue near you.

MySpace-Photobucket deal
A Web site that enables its users to store photos and video for inclusion in MySpace profiles will become a part of the popular online hangout.

Web puzzle digitizes books
Researchers have discovered a way to enlist people across the globe to help digitize books.

A TV screen that bends
Sony has developed a razor-thin display that bends like paper while showing full-color video.
